Text:
Just read about this author on New York Times (http://www.reuters.com/article/2012/10/31/canada-prize-giller-idUSL1E8LUC5P20121031) and here's book itself!
Having previously read scamorama.com, now I'm looking forward to reading this book.
The Kindle conversion quality may not be perfect, but it's the best you'll get for now I suspect :)
